name: Espathra
flavorText: It immobilizes opponents by bathing them in psychic power from its large eyes. Despite its appearance, it has a vicious temperament.

previous.name: Flittle
previous.flavorText: Flittle’s toes levitate about half an inch above the ground because of the psychic power emitted from the frills on the Pokémon’s belly.

next.name: Tinkatink
next.flavorText: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.
